executiveSummary: Steve Gray pitched 'The Peep Show,' a modern birdhouse equipped with a hidden camera that streams nesting activity to smartphones. He sought $250,000 for 20% equity. While the Sharks praised the design and concept, concerns over privacy and early-stage sales led all Sharks to decline investment.
nextSteps: Steve Gray will continue selling and promoting the Peep Show independently, with interest from some Sharks to purchase units personally.
